member.name: T:dylan.NET.Compiler.Module1
member.summary: The main module of the compiler.
member.remarks: This class houses the main method of the compiler.

member.name: M:dylan.NET.Compiler.Module1.main(System.String[])
member.param: An array of string with the arguments. Currently only 1 element is required. i.e. the path to the main file specifying other files etc. Further elements in the array will be left uninterpreted.
member.summary: Starts the whole compilation process i.e. this bootstraps the process of lexer, parser, codegen.
member.remarks: If invoking programmatically please do not use Process.Start() but reference dnc.exe and invoke dnc.main(string[]) directly. If using the console type 'dnc [path]'.
